Package com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface Renderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClearTheme.ComponentRenderer, GameSenseTheme.ComponentRenderer, HUDPanel.HUDRenderer, RendererBase
public interface Renderer
An Interface to standardize the appearance of different components.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.awt.Color brighter​(java.awt.Color color)
    Utility function to make a color brighter.
    static java.awt.Color darker​(java.awt.Color color)
    Utility function to make a color darker.
    java.awt.Color getBackgroundColor​(boolean focus)
    Returns the standard background color.
    int getBorder()
    Returns the horizontal border around a component in a container.
    ColorScheme getDefaultColorScheme()
    Returns the default color scheme.
    java.awt.Color getFontColor​(boolean focus)
    Returns the font color.
    int getHeight()
    Returns the default height for components.
    java.awt.Color getMainColor​(boolean focus, boolean active)
    Returns the main color of a title bar.
    int getOffset()
    Returns the vertical space between two components in a container.
    void overrideColorScheme​(ColorScheme scheme)
    Overrides the default color scheme.
    void renderBackground​(Context context, boolean focus)
    Render the background for a container.
    void renderBorder​(Context context, boolean focus, boolean active, boolean open)
    Render the border for a container.
    void renderRect​(Context context, java.lang.String text, boolean focus, boolean active, java.awt.Rectangle rectangle, boolean overlay)
    Render partial title bar (e.g. for a slider).
    void renderTitle​(Context context, java.lang.String text, boolean focus)
    Render the title bar for a component, while deciding whether to render an active or inactive title bar.

    Render the title bar for a component.

    Render the title bar for a container.
    void restoreColorScheme()
    Restores the default color scheme.

  • Method Details

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      Returns the default height for components.
      Returns:
      the component height

    • getOffset

      int getOffset()
      Returns the vertical space between two components in a container.
      Returns:
      the vertical offset

    • getBorder

      int getBorder()
      Returns the horizontal border around a component in a container.
      Returns:
      the horizontal border

    • renderTitle

      void renderTitle​(Context context, java.lang.String text, boolean focus)
      Render the title bar for a component, while deciding whether to render an active or inactive title bar.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      text - the caption of the component
      focus - the focus state for the component

    • renderTitle

      void renderTitle​(Context context, java.lang.String text, boolean focus, boolean active)
      Render the title bar for a component.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      text - the caption of the component
      focus - the focus state for the component
      active - whether the component is active or inactive

    • renderTitle

      void renderTitle​(Context context, java.lang.String text, boolean focus, boolean active, boolean open)
      Render the title bar for a container.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      text - the caption of the component
      focus - the focus state for the component
      active - whether the component is active or inactive
      open - whether the container is open or closed

    • renderRect

      void renderRect​(Context context, java.lang.String text, boolean focus, boolean active, java.awt.Rectangle rectangle, boolean overlay)
      Render partial title bar (e.g. for a slider).
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      text - the caption of the component
      focus - the focus state for the component
      active - whether the component is active or inactive
      rectangle - the rectangle defining the title bar
      overlay - whether to render mouse hover overlay

    • renderBackground

      void renderBackground​(Context context, boolean focus)
      Render the background for a container.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      focus - the focus state for the component

    • renderBorder

      void renderBorder​(Context context, boolean focus, boolean active, boolean open)
      Render the border for a container.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component
      focus - the focus state for the component
      active - whether the component is active or inactive
      open - whether the container is open or closed

      Returns the main color of a title bar.

      active - whether the component is active or inactive
      Returns:
      the main color

    • getDefaultColorScheme

      ColorScheme getDefaultColorScheme()
      Returns the default color scheme.
      Returns:
      the color scheme

    • overrideColorScheme

      void overrideColorScheme​(ColorScheme scheme)
      Overrides the default color scheme. restoreColorScheme() should always be called after rendering using a custom color scheme is finished.
      Parameters:
      scheme - the custom color scheme

    • restoreColorScheme

      void restoreColorScheme()
      Restores the default color scheme.

    • brighter

      static java.awt.Color brighter​(java.awt.Color color)
      Utility function to make a color brighter.
      Parameters:
      color - a color
      Returns:
      a brighter version of that color

      Returns:
